description: A comprehensive set of extensions methods to complement Cuemon .NET Framework Additions.
releaseNotes:
This is a minor release with some improvements and breaking changes due to new Cuemon assembly version.
The following work was completed for this release:

- New extensions for Byte[]: ToBase64, FromByteArray
- New extensions for DateTime: ToString
- New extensions for Generic[]: Concat
- New extensions for IDataReader: ToRows, ToColumns
- New extensions for Object: As
- New extensions for String: ToTitleCase, FormatWith, FromBase64, ReplaceAll, ContainsAny, EqualsAny, ContainsAll, TrimAll
- New extensions for String[]: Join
- New extensions for Type: AsCode
- New extensions for XsltArgumentList: Add

Note: this version has a breaking change from assembly version 2.5.2013.2800 to 2.7.2014.250.
summary: Cuemon .NET Framework Additions is a free and flexible assembly package, built to extend and boost your codebelt - providing vast ways of possiblities for all breeds of coders, programmers, developers
title: Cuemon .NET Framework Extensions
